00001 module write_f_rzvv

00005     subroutine write_f ()
00006         use rzvv_grid
00007         use netcdf
00008         use init_mpi
00009         use read_particle_list
00010         use read_namelist
00011         use dlg
00012         implicit none
00013     
00014         character ( len = 103 ) :: ncFileName
00015         integer :: nc_id, 
00016             R_nBins_id, 
00017             z_nBins_id, 
00018             vPerp_nBins_id, 
00019             vPar_nBins_id, 
00020             f_rzvv_id, 
00021             R_binCenters_id, 
00022             z_binCenters_id, 
00023             vPerp_binCenters_id, 
00024             vPar_binCenters_id, 
00025             R_nBins_p1_id, 
00026             z_nBins_p1_id, 
00027             vPerp_nBins_p1_id, 
00028             vPar_nBins_p1_id, 
00029             R_binEdges_id, 
00030             z_binEdges_id, 
00031             vPerp_binEdges_id, 
00032             vPar_binEdges_id, 
00033             scalar_id, 
00034             nP_id, 
00035             R_binSize_id, 
00036             z_binSize_id, 
00037             vPerp_binSize_id, vPar_binSize_id, 
00038             vPerp_range_id, vPar_range_id, 
00039             density_id
00040 
00041         !ncFileName = trim(pl_fileName) // '.nc'
00042         ncFileName = 'data/fdis.dav.nc'
00043 
00044         call dlg_check ( nf90_create ( ncFileName, nf90_clobber, nc_id ) )
00045         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "R_nBins", R_nBins, R_nBins_id ) )
00046         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "z_nBins", z_nBins, z_nBins_id ) )
00047         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "vPerp_nBins", vPerp_nBins, vPerp_nBins_id ) )
00048         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "vPar_nBins", vPar_nBins, vPar_nBins_id ) )
00049 
00050         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "R_nBins_p1", R_nBins+1, R_nBins_p1_id ) )
00051         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "z_nBins_p1", z_nBins+1, z_nBins_p1_id ) )
00052         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "vPerp_nBins_p1", vPerp_nBins+1, vPerp_nBins_p1_id ) )
00053         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "vPar_nBins_p1", vPar_nBins+1, vPar_nBins_p1_id ) )
00054 
00055         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_dim ( nc_id, "scalar", 1, scalar_id ) )
00056 
00057         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "f_rzvv", NF90_REAL, &
00058             (/ R_nBins_id, z_nBins_id, vPerp_nBins_id, vPar_nBins_id /), &
00059             f_rzvv_id ) )
00060  
00061         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "R_binCenters", NF90_REAL, &
00062             R_nBins_id, R_binCenters_id ) ) 
00063         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "z_binCenters", NF90_REAL, &
00064             z_nBins_id, z_binCenters_id ) ) 
00065         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "vPerp_binCenters", NF90_REAL, &
00066             vPerp_nBins_id, vPerp_binCenters_id ) ) 
00067         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "vPar_binCenters", NF90_REAL, &
00068             vPar_nBins_id, vPar_binCenters_id ) ) 
00069 
00070         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "R_binEdges", NF90_REAL, &
00071             R_nBins_p1_id, R_binEdges_id ) ) 
00072         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "z_binEdges", NF90_REAL, &
00073             z_nBins_p1_id, z_binEdges_id ) ) 
00074         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "vPerp_binEdges", NF90_REAL, &
00075             vPerp_nBins_p1_id, vPerp_binEdges_id ) ) 
00076         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "vPar_binEdges", NF90_REAL, &
00077             vPar_nBins_p1_id, vPar_binEdges_id ) ) 
00078 
00079         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "nP", NF90_INT, &
00080             scalar_id, nP_id ) )
00081 
00082         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "R_binSize", NF90_REAL, &
00083             scalar_id, R_binSize_id ) ) 
00084         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "z_binSize", NF90_REAL, &
00085             scalar_id, z_binSize_id ) ) 
00086         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "vPerp_binSize", NF90_REAL, &
00087             scalar_id, vPerp_binSize_id ) ) 
00088         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "vPar_binSize", NF90_REAL, &
00089             scalar_id, vPar_binSize_id ) ) 
00090         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "vPar_range", NF90_REAL, &
00091             scalar_id, vPar_range_id ) ) 
00092         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "vPerp_range", NF90_REAL, &
00093             scalar_id, vPerp_range_id ) ) 
00094         call dlg_check ( nf90_def_var ( nc_id, "density", NF90_REAL, &
00095             (/ R_nBins_id, z_nBins_id /), density_id ) ) 
00096 
00097 
00098         call dlg_check ( nf90_enddef ( nc_id ) )
00099 
00100         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, nP_id, nP ) )
00101         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, f_rzvv_id, f_rzvv ) )
00102         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, R_binCenters_id, R_binCenters ) )
00103         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, z_binCenters_id, z_binCenters ) )
00104         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, vPerp_binCenters_id, vPerp_binCenters ) )
00105         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, vPar_binCenters_id, vPar_binCenters ) )
00106         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, R_binEdges_id, R_binEdges ) )
00107         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, z_binEdges_id, z_binEdges ) )
00108         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, vPerp_binEdges_id, vPerp_binEdges ) )
00109         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, vPar_binEdges_id, vPar_binEdges ) )
00110         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, R_binSize_id, R_binSize ) )
00111         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, z_binSize_id, z_binSize ) )
00112         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, vPerp_binSize_id, vPerp_binSize ) )
00113         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, vPar_binSize_id, vPar_binSize ) )
00114         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, vPar_range_id, vPar_range ) )
00115         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, vPerp_range_id, vPerp_range ) )
00116         call dlg_check ( nf90_put_var ( nc_id, density_id, density ) )
00117 
00118         call dlg_check ( nf90_close ( nc_id ) )
00119 
00120     end subroutine write_f
00121 
00122 end module write_f_rzvv
